articles.title: Chelsea eye a SHOCK swoop for struggling Manchester United and England defender Harry Maguire - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The England international - who is sweating on his place in United's team for Monday's crunch clash against Liverpool - is of interest to the Stamford Bridge club.
articles.content:
Chelsea have made a shock enquiry about Harry Maguires availability amid growing doubt over the central defenders future at Manchester United.
